```{r}

library(purrr)
library(readxl)
path <- "assets/20250521_LadenburgConsensusStatements_German.xlsx"
data <- read_xlsx(path, sheet = "German")
```

```{r}
#| results: "asis"
#| echo: false

res <- pmap(data, function(number, statement, simplified, context, reference) {
  knitr::knit_child(text = c(
    '## `r statement`',
    '',
    '### Nummer',
    '',
    '`r number`',
    '',
    '### Vereinfachtes Statement',
    '',
    '`r simplified`',
    '',
    '### Kontextinformation',
    '',
    '`r context`',
    '',
    '### Referenzen',
    '',
    '`r reference`',
    ''
  ), envir = environment(), quiet = TRUE)
  })
#evaluates the code above
cat(unlist(res), sep = "\n")
```
